how to create new adverticing account for new product

To create a new advertising account for a new product on NewsBreak, follow these steps:

1. Log in to your NewsBreak account and navigate to the 'Account Management' tab.
2. Click on 'Create ad account' under the 'Ad Accounts' section.
3. Fill out the details for your new ad account and submit them.

Remember, each ad account requires its own billing setup, so make sure to configure that as well. For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to create separate ad accounts](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/20333724725133-How-to-create-separate-ad-accounts).
hi, could the 10dollar charge from setting a payment option be returned, since my last 7 days ad spend has been under 10dollars ?

Hi there! The $10 charge you're referring to is a temporary card authorization fee. This fee is not an actual charge and is held for 7 days. If it's not captured within this time, the payment will be canceled, and the funds will be released back to your account. If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to ask!

I'm sorry to hear that the amount hasn't been returned yet. Since the $10 is a temporary authorization, it should be released back to your account after 7 days if not used. If it's been longer than that, I recommend reaching out to your bank for further assistance. If you need more help from our side, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with your details.
